alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Central and Southeast Howard; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 6:46AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT CARROLL COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...NORTHERN HOWARD COUNTY IN CENTRAL MARYLAND...SOUTHERN HARFORD COUNTY IN NORTHERN MARYLAND...NORTHEASTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND BALTIMORE COUNTIES IN NORTHERN MARYLAND AND BALTIMORE CITY... At 641 AM EST, an area of snow showers was located along a line extending from near Emmitsburg to near Aberdeen. Movement was east at 5 mph. Snowfall will coat the ground causing slippery conditions. Visibility will be locally reduced to one mile at times. Be prepared for sudden changes in visibility when travelling along with snow covered and slippery surfaces. Drive slowly when encountering snow showers early this morning. Interstate 83 south of Hereford will be impacted by this band along with the northern portions of I-895 and portions of I-95. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling. Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Frederick, Pikesville, Middle River, Cockeysville, Westminster, Aberdeen, Thurmont, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Millers Island, North Point State Park, Back River, Historic Ellicott City, Ellicott City, Dundalk, Towson, Bel Air South, Catonsville, Essex and Woodlawn.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Central and Southeast Howard; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
